issues.details: ESLint validation failed repeatedly with `ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND: Cannot find package '@eslint/js'`.
issues.resolution: Troubleshooting revealed the dependency was installed in `/app/frontend/node_modules` but ESLint expected it in the root `/node_modules`. Installed `@eslint/js` and related plugins (`eslint-plugin-react-hooks`, `eslint-plugin-react-refresh`) at the repository root using `pnpm add -D`.

issues.resolution: Acknowledged. No action taken as these are expected untracked build artifacts.

overall_drift_assessment: Minor drift encountered due to validation script error and ESLint configuration issues, both resolved during the batch execution. Significant number of untracked files noted, consistent with previous validations.
